value:
$nMPID_神階ミラ|Seeing all of these smiles reminds me
of the paradise I once envisioned for
my people. Isn't it lovely, Brother?

$nMPID_比翼ドーマ|These humans are all so sickeningly
carefree... If this is truly what human
wisdom inspires, it should be feared.

$nMPID_比翼ドーマ|You want this candy? Then show me
your strength, and hold nothing ba—
Mila, wait! You can't just give it away!

$nMPID_神階ミラ|We must treat those who worship us
equally. May every soul find one of
these delicious candies in their palm!

May this castle be safeguarded by my
strength and Mila's love, and the land
awaken to the harvest's blessings!

$nMPID_比翼ドーマ|Very good! As arbiters of this festival,
we shall offer up a prayer for unlimited
blessings and unending struggle!

$nMPID_比翼ドーマ|To trick, or to treat...but to whom,
and for what reason? The human
mind is as inscrutable as ever.

$nMPID_神階ミラ|Brother... You must not let humans
continue to think might makes right.
The gift of love is for one and all.

$nMPID_神階ミラ|Excessive displays of emotion can be
dangerous for dragons, so my brother
and I typically refrain from them.

Let praise ring out across the land for
Duma's strength and Mila's love! We
shall answer the harvest festival's call.

$nMPID_比翼ドーマ|The harvest is a blessing that sustains
life. Surely this festival is meant to
extol you and you alone, Sister?$k$p$nMPID_神階ミラ|Are you regretting my invitation? You
never did have patience for humans
who enjoyed anything other than war.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ドーマ|If you speak of Rigel and Zofia, then
that is in the past. We have already
entrusted Valentia to its heroes.$k$p$nMPID_神階ミラ|Indeed, and so it shall be. They are,
after all, the ones who corrected
our courses when we went astray.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ドーマ|Yet my ideals remain unchanged: war
was, is, and always will be necessary
for humans to mete out true justice.$k$p$nMPID_神階ミラ|As do mine: love was, is, and always
will be necessary for gods to bless
and guide the people from on high.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ドーマ|And humans must find a place for
themselves somewhere in between.
Until then...let us enjoy the harvest.
$nMPID_二人|Our blessing upon you!
$nMPID_二人|Onward. Indeed.
$nMPID_比翼ドーマ|You should be grateful.
$nMPID_神階ミラ|I bless this land.
Impossible...
Enjoy yourself.
I will watch over you.
"My sister..." "Yes, Duma..."
"Love..." "And strength!"
"To think a day would come when we could enjoy ourselves like this..." "Indeed, it is truly a wonder."
Hmm...
Leave it to me.
What fun!

$nMPID_神階ミラ|I must say, dear brother...you wear
that costume well!

$nMPID_比翼ドーマ|Ugh. Why must we debase ourselves?
It only diminishes our godly authority.

$nMPID_神階ミラ|Haha. We are in a different world.
To these people, who know us not,
we pass as human revelers.

$nMPID_比翼ドーマ|So it is reverence they lack... Tell me,
Mila. If not gods, who do the humans
honor with their harvest festival?

$nMPID_神階ミラ|From what I can tell, it is not held to
honor anyone specific, but rather to
give thanks to the land for its bounty.

$nMPID_比翼ドーマ|In that case, what possible reason
could there be for wearing these
ridiculous outfits?

$nMPID_神階ミラ|We will have to find that out together.
The human mind never fails to
conjure up the most curious of ideas.

Does it not excite you to wear
something different for once? I find
this all to be rather invigorating.

I was once bored with life, unable to
find any stimulus that could stir even
the faintest feelings in my heart.

This costume and festival, though...
They are like a breath of fresh air that
reminds me of the joy of being alive.

$nMPID_比翼ドーマ|Absurd. The hearts of gods must not
be so fickle as to be swayed by mere
festivals such as this. And yet...
$nMPID_神階ミラ|And yet?

$nMPID_比翼ドーマ|My mind must be starting to go, for I
find myself unable to deny that your
enjoyment of this silliness pleases me.
$nMPID_神階ミラ|Duma...

$nMPID_比翼ドーマ|As you have observed, today we join
this festival in the attire of ordinary
revelers. Thus, let us act accordingly.

Take my hand, Sister. These humans
will be hard-pressed to tell us apart
from any other merry pair.
$nMPID_神階ミラ|I would like that very much, Brother.
